name: Eco-Friendly Cork Yoga Mat
description:
Find Your Balance with Earthy Comfort
Experience the perfect blend of comfort, support, and sustainability with Gayo's Premium Cork Yoga Mat with Enhanced Grip. Designed to elevate your yoga practice, this high-grip cork yoga mat for home workouts offers ample room to stretch, flow, and meditate.
 Its added thickness cushions your joints for enhanced support during your most challenging poses, making it an ideal choice for eco-friendly yoga enthusiasts seeking performance and durability.


Earthy Comfort: The cork surface yoga mat provides a soft yet firm texture for excellent joint cushioning.
Spine Aligned: Built-in alignment lines help improve posture.
Bigger & Thicker: This durable cork yoga mat for all levels of practice features a spacious design for extra support.

Non-Slip Performance: Enjoy the superior performance of this sustainable cork yoga mat with a non-slip surface, ensuring stability during practice.

Durable & Sustainable: Made from sustainably sourced cork and natural rubber, our product is an eco-conscious choice. Ideal for home use, it offers both comfortable cork surface benefits and exceptional grip.

This cork yoga mat is ideal for practice at any level, offering exceptional durability and stability. Its sustainable cork surface ensures a top-notch experience, enhancing your practice with reliable support and eco-friendly benefits.

name: Organic & Eco-Friendly Cotton Yoga Mat
description:
Organic Comfort for Your Practice
Introducing Gayo’s Handmade Organic Cotton Yoga Mat, the perfect eco-friendly yoga mat for mindful practice and conscious living. This handcrafted yoga mat is made from 100% natural cotton, offering a soft, supportive surface ideal for home yoga sessions or outdoor yoga workouts.
 Whether you’re seeking a sustainable yoga mat for restorative or gentle yoga or a breathable organic cotton mat for travel, this mat delivers comfort, durability, and environmental care.
 Designed for year-round use, it also doubles as an organic cotton exercise mat for indoor and outdoor mindfulness practices. Elevate your yoga experience with a mat that embodies mindfulness, sustainability, and effortless comfort.

Comfortable and supportive
Durable & long-lasting
Absorbent & moisture-wicking
Lightweight & Portable - Ideal for travel and on-the-go yogis

name: Eco Balance Yoga Mat- 4 mm
description:
Stability, Comfort & Sustainability in Every Pose
Looking for a yoga mat that’s comfortable, durable, and easy to carry? The Eco Balance Yoga Mat 4 mm delivers just that, combining eco-friendly materials with superior grip for a stable and reliable practice.
 Made from natural tree rubber and high-performance Eco-polyurethane, this non-toxic, sustainable yoga mat supports all styles of yoga, from active flows to restorative sessions. Its 4 mm thickness provides balanced cushioning to protect your joints while maintaining a grounded feel.
 Lightweight and portable, it’s perfect for home workouts, studio classes, or outdoor yoga sessions, making it a top choice for buyers who value performance, sustainability, and convenience.


 Your Practice, Your Planet – Made with natural rubber and free from harmful toxins.

Enhanced Performance – "EcoLock Surface Technology" keeps you stable, even in sweaty sessions.

Alignment Lines for Precision – Helps maintain perfect posture, refine your form, and deepen your practice

Lightweight & Portable – Easy to carry with the included strap for on-the-go yoga.

Aesthetic & Functional Design - In Soft & Calming Colors this mat is designed to create a peaceful, focused environment.

Designed for yogis of all levels, this mat brings comfort and confidence to every practice. Elevate your flow with a mat that’s as mindful as your movements.. Designed to last, reducing waste over time.

name: Eco Balance Pro Yoga Mat- 5 mm
description:
Stability, Comfort & Sustainability in Every Pose
Move with confidence on a mat designed for grip, durability, and eco-friendly performance. Made from natural tree rubber and high-performance Eco-polyurethane, this non-toxic mat provides excellent traction and support for all styles of yoga.
 With a 5 mm thickness for optimal cushioning, it’s the perfect choice if you’re wondering “what thickness yoga mat should I get?”
 Featuring alignment lines for precision and a lightweight, portable design, it’s an ideal yoga mat for home practice or studio and outdoor yoga workouts.
